title: 50 Greatest Poems
author: George Calvin
description: An anthology of 50 well‑loved poems from the Western canon — spanning poets like Homer, Shakespeare, Wordsworth, Rumi, Whitman, Emily Dickinson, Poe, Elizabeth Barrett Browning and others — offering a curated journey through timeless poetry. 192 pages, English-language paperback. Published by Rupa Publications. ISBN 978‑9357025973. Published 31 Aug 2023.
